CustomField.description: Displays the Billing Country in the format CountryCode - CountryName for Conga. Hidden on UI
CustomField.formula:
CASE( TEXT(BillingCountryCode),
"AE", "AE - Utd.Arab.Emir.", "BA", "BA - Bosnia-Herz.", "BO", "BO - Bolivia", "BY", "BY - Rep. of Belarus", "CI", "CI - Ivory Coast", "CN", "CN - PR China", "DO", "DO - Dominican Rep.", "GB", "GB - Great Britain", "IR", "IR - Iran", "KR", "KR - South Korea", "MD", "MD - Moldova", "MK", "MK - Macedonia", "MO", "MO - Macau", "RU", "RU - Russian Fed.", "TT", "TT - Trinidad,Tobago", "TW", "TW - Taiwan", "TZ", "TZ - Tanzania", "US", "US - USA",
TEXT(BillingCountryCode) & " - " & BillingCountry )
CustomField.label: Formatted Country
